Package com.inrupt.client.openid

OpenID support for the Inrupt client libraries.

This modules uses the OpenIdProvider to interact with a OpenId Provider as described in the Solid-OIDC Primer v 0.1.0

To retrieve the OpenId Provider configuration one can make use of the metadata() method as in the next example: 


    DPoP dpop = new DPoP();
    HttpProcessor client = ServiceProvider.getHttpProcessor();
    OpenIdProvider openIdProvider = new OpenIdProvider(URI.create("https:/example.example/issuer")), dpop, client);

    Metadata opConfig = openIdProvider.metadata();

    System.out.println("Token endpoint is: " + opConfig.tokenEndpoint.toString());
    System.out.println("Revocation endpoint is: " + opConfig.revocationEndpoint.toString());

Generating a PKCE code challenge and verifier is as simple as in the next example: 


    String challenge = PKCE.createChallenge("example verifier");
    String verifier = PKCE.createVerifier();

At some point we need to request a token with a code and a verifier. This is achieved as in the following example: 


    TokenRequest tokenReq = TokenRequest.newBuilder()
        .code("someCode")
        .codeVerifier("myCodeverifier")
        .build(
            "authorization_code",
            "myClientId",
            URI.create("https://example.example/redirectUri")
        );

    TokenResponse token = openIdProvider.token(tokenReq);

    System.out.println("Token id is: " + token.idToken);
    System.out.println("Token type is: " + token.tokenType);
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorizationRequest
    A class representing an authorization request at an OpenID provider.
    AuthorizationRequest.Builder
    A class for building AuthorizationRequest objects.
    EndSessionRequest
    A class for initiating a session termination flow with an OpenID Provider.
    EndSessionRequest.Builder
    A builder class for EndSessionRequest objects.
    Metadata
    A data structure representing an Open ID Connect discovery document.
    OpenIdProvider
    A class for interacting with an OpenID Provider.
    PKCE
    A class for generating values for Proof Key for Code Exchange (PKCE) interactions.
    TokenRequest
    A class for representing a Token request.
    TokenRequest.Builder
    A builder class for TokenRequest objects.
    TokenResponse
    A class representing successful responses from a token endpoint.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OpenIdException
    A runtime exception for use with OpenID-related errors.
